page.title: 14Agriculture
page.content: The agriculture in this area is mainly arable . The crops that are grown are sugarbeet,wheat,barley,peas,beans,and potatoes.There is some grazing land around Reepham,where cows are kept for milk and for beef.Modern farming is used for some crops.Special harvesters ,drills,elevators and riddlers are used for potatoes and sugarbeet. Big Tractors up to 345 horsepower are used with ten furrow ploughs.Most of the fields which are used for arable farming are very large and the hedges have been taken out.The fields which are used for grazing are much smaller and still have hedges.There is a fish farm,next to the river,where you can go fishing or go and buy fish. There is some wasteland near Whitwell Hall. There is a grain store and a place where farm machinery is sold and repaired.
